member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddBoxCollider
member.summary: Adds or configures a BoxCollider component with character-specific collision dimensions. Sets different box sizes and centers for various enemy types (Xenomorph, FaceHugger, etc.) with default humanoid dimensions as fallback.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddRigidbody
member.summary: Adds or configures a Rigidbody component for physics simulation. Sets the rigidbody to kinematic mode with gravity disabled for manual physics control.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Awake
member.summary: Unity lifecycle method that initializes TestVanDammeAnim. Sets up sprite systems, parachute functionality, collision layers, materials, and core physics components required for character operation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.FixedUpdate
member.summary: Unity fixed update method that checks if the unit has exited oil areas at fixed intervals.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.LateUpdate
member.summary: Unity lifecycle method for post-frame updates. Handles input bit preservation, inseminator unit synchronization, map disable area extension, and quicksand checking.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.OnDestroy
member.summary: Unity lifecycle callback when the GameObject is destroyed. Calls base implementation for cleanup.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.OnDisable
member.summary: Unity lifecycle callback when the component is disabled. Empty implementation for potential override.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.OnEnable
member.summary: Unity lifecycle callback when the component is enabled. Empty implementation for potential override.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RegisterUnit
member.summary: Registers this unit with the Map system for game tracking and management.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunSync
member.summary: Network synchronization method that updates the unit's position. Calls base synchronization and updates the transform position based on current X/Y coordinates.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetDefaultGroundLayer
member.summary: Sets up the default ground collision layer mask including Ground, LargeObjects, and IndestructibleGround layers for ground detection and collision checking.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetDeltaTime
member.summary: Updates the frame delta time with clamping to prevent large time steps. Stores previous frame time and clamps current time to maximum of 0.0334 seconds.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetHighFiveBoostDeltaTime
member.summary: Sets modified delta time during high-five boost effects. Applies different time multipliers based on time scale and special boost conditions.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetStrictGroundLayer
member.summary: Sets up a strict ground collision layer mask including only Ground and IndestructibleGround layers, excluding LargeObjects for more restrictive ground detection.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Start
member.summary: Unity lifecycle method that handles game mode-specific initialization. Configures special ammo based on game mode (deathmatch, procedural generation, campaign), sets up sound system, avatar states, and initial invulnerability.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Update
member.summary: Core Unity lifecycle method that executes the main update loop for TestVanDammeAnim each frame. Processes essential character systems in this execution order: 1. **Acid coverage effects** - Visual and damage processing for acid-covered characters 2. **Delta time management** - Frame timing with high-five boost support 3. **Input processing** - Handle player input or trigger action control 4. **Status effect timers** - Stun, freeze, zombie revival, and death counters 5. **Animation frame management** - Sprite frame advancement and timing 6. **Movement calculation and execution** - Core physics and movement processing 7. **Special movement states** - Impaled, strung-up, or platform movement 8. **Combat systems** - Weapon management, firing, and melee processing 9. **Hero-specific systems** - Checkpoints, rescues, enemy alerting, item pickup 10. **Invulnerability management** - Temporary invincibility and revival timing 11. **Alien infection system** - Insemination mechanics and chest-bursting 12. **Environmental effects** - Ducking, grass interaction, boundary checks 13. **Audio and visual effects** - Wall dragging sounds, trails, freeze shaders 14. **Player management** - Kick system and recall mechanics 15. **Parachute system** - Deployment timing and physics modification This method coordinates all core character functionality and represents the main execution loop for character behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CancelMelee
member.summary: Cleanly exits melee state and resets all melee-related variables. Clears all melee flags, removes target reference, and intelligently determines next action state based on current conditions (preserves ladder climbing, sets jumping if airborne, running if moving, or idle).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckBustCage
member.summary: Checks if there's a cage in front of the player that can be broken. Performs a raycast within 16 units to detect cage components.
member.returns: True if a cage is found that can be busted, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckPlasmaDeath(System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Handles special plasma/vaporization death effects when plasma damage is 1 or greater. Creates white flash effects and for explosion damage types, generates area damage and smoke effects while shaking the camera and disturbing nearby wildlife. Returns true if plasma death occurred.
member.param: Reference to horizontal gib velocity, modified for plasma deaths
Reference to vertical gib velocity, modified for plasma deaths
member.returns: True if plasma death effects were triggered, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CreateGibEffects(DamageType,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates appropriate visual effects when the character is gibbed based on damage type. Crush damage creates a spread pattern, OutOfBounds uses larger spread, and BittenBySandworm creates directional effects. Generates frozen particles if the character was frozen, plays gib sounds, and sprays blood effects.
member.param: Type of damage determining the gib effect pattern
Base horizontal velocity for effects
Base vertical velocity for effects

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CreateGibs(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Default gib creation method that generates standard gib pieces with velocity. Uses the character's material for gib textures and applies an upward bias to gib velocity for more dramatic effect.
member.param: Horizontal velocity for gib pieces
Vertical velocity for gib pieces

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Damage(System.Int32,DamageType,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32,UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Core damage handling method that processes all incoming damage to the character. Handles special cases like inseminator unit redirection, parachute destruction (grants 1.33s invulnerability), instant-gib damage types, acid coverage, skeleton creation, and damage reduction based on game mode. Creates appropriate visual effects (blood, impact effects) and manages death state including revival mechanics. Triggers death sequence if health drops below zero.
member.param: Amount of damage to apply
Type of damage being applied (affects reactions and effects)
Horizontal impulse force from damage
Vertical impulse force from damage
Direction of incoming damage (-1 left, 1 right)
The MonoBehaviour that caused the damage (for kill tracking)
X coordinate where damage was applied
Y coordinate where damage was applied

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DealWithBounce(DamageType@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Handles bounce damage differently based on whether the unit is a player or enemy. For players in non-competitive modes, nullifies all damage and applies a 0.25 second blind effect instead. For enemies or players in DeathMatch/BroDown modes, changes the damage type to Crush.
member.param: Reference to the damage type, may be changed to Crush
Reference to the damage amount, set to 0 for players in non-competitive modes

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Death(System.Single,System.Single,DamageObject)
member.summary: Handles the complete character death sequence. Cancels active melee attacks, deactivates parachute, stops network syncing, clears revival sources, stops player UI bubbles, reports kills for scoring, reduces lives if applicable, applies death velocity modifications, deactivates weapons, creates blood effects, releases held objects, disables collision, and saves death GIFs for player characters. This is the main death orchestration method.
member.param: Horizontal velocity to apply on death
Vertical velocity to apply on death
DamageObject containing information about what killed the character

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DestroyRemoteProjectile
member.summary: Destroys a remotely controlled projectile. Clears controlling flag and calls Death() on the projectile.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.FallDamage(System.Single)
member.summary: Virtual method for handling fall damage based on fall velocity. Empty implementation for subclasses to calculate and apply fall damage.
member.param: The vertical velocity at impact

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.FindNearbyMook
member.summary: Searches for a nearby mook that can be interacted with. Prioritizes skinned mook on the player's back, otherwise searches for mooks within 30 unit radius behind the player.

Releases held objects, sets appropriate death type, creates gib visual effects, sends network RPC to synchronize gibbing, saves death GIFs for heroes, handles special plasma death effects, and disconnects any attached face huggers.

Vertical velocity for gib pieces

member.returns: True if doing melee and cannot do independent animations, false otherwise

Applies half the horizontal knockback force and uses different vertical limits for heroes (300) versus enemies (400). Automatically deactivates parachute if knocked upward.

Horizontal knockback force (half is applied)

Whether to force the character into a tumbling state (currently unused)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunFiring
member.summary: Main firing logic update that manages fire rate, delays, and weapon usage. Stops rolling when firing, handles fire counter and rate modifications, triggers the UseFire method, applies avatar effects, and clears gesture animations during combat.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunIndependentMeleeFrames
member.summary: Virtual method for handling melee animation frames independently from main animation. Allows subclasses to implement custom melee animation logic.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunKnifeMeleeMovement
member.summary: Handles movement physics during knife melee attacks with three distinct patterns. Old system applies simple gravity. Jumping melee applies falling gravity with speed clamping. Dashing melee uses frame-based movement: frames 0-1 stop movement, frames 2-3 dash horizontally (with target tracking if available), frames 4-5 reduce speed, frames 6+ apply only gravity. Quicksand disables horizontal movement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunMelee
member.summary: Executes melee attack behavior by delegating to RunKnifeMeleeMovement. Acts as the entry point for melee execution.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetMeleeType
member.summary: Determines the type of melee attack (standing, jumping, or dashing) based on current character state. When using new knifing frames, checks if jumping, moving horizontally, or on ladder to set appropriate melee type.

member.summary: Sets character velocity from damage or explosion forces, adding to existing velocity rather than replacing it. Clamps horizontal velocity to Â±200 and vertical velocity between -20000 and 300 to prevent excessive speeds.

Horizontal velocity to add
Additional horizontal blast force (currently same as xI)
Vertical blast force to add

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UseFire
member.summary: Executes primary weapon firing sequence. Cancels melee if active, calculates projectile trajectory, spawns projectile, plays attack sound, and disturbs wildlife.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim._invulnerableTime
member.summary: Remaining duration of invulnerability in seconds. Decremented each frame, providing temporary damage immunity. Commonly set after spawning (3 seconds) or parachute destruction (1.33 seconds). Visual feedback provided through flashing effect.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.addedDeathMatchScore
member.summary: Flag preventing duplicate score additions in deathmatch game modes. Set to true after death score is recorded to ensure each death only counts once. Reset when the unit respawns for the next life.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canDoIndependentMeleeAnimation
member.summary: Allows melee animations to play independently from movement animations. When true, melee attacks don't interrupt movement animations. Used by characters like IndianaBrones.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canGib
member.summary: Determines if this character can be gibbed (exploded into pieces) when killed. Default true allows normal gibbing on death. Set to false for characters that should have death animations instead of exploding. Checked during death processing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.cancelMeleeOnChangeDirection
member.summary: Stops melee attack when the character changes facing direction. Used by characters with directional melee attacks to ensure attacks match the intended direction.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.dashingMelee
member.summary: Indicates the character is performing a melee attack while dashing. Set by SetMeleeType() when dashing, triggers special dash-melee animations and damage values.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.deadTimeCounter
member.summary: Timer tracking how long the unit has been dead. Incremented each frame after death. Used for delayed effects like late gibbing, corpse removal, or preventing revival after extended death duration.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.disembowelHoldFrames
member.summary: Frame counter for chainsaw disembowelment death animation. When greater than zero, holds the death animation at the current frame to show prolonged chainsaw damage. Creates dramatic pause during brutal chainsaw deaths.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.doingMelee
member.summary: Indicates the character is currently performing a melee attack. Affects animation states and prevents certain other actions while active. Cleared when the melee attack completes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.fireCounter
member.summary: Accumulates time to control automatic firing rate. When this counter exceeds fireRate, a shot is fired and the counter is decremented by fireRate. Initialized to 0.0667 to ensure immediate first shot capability.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.fireDelay
member.summary: Delay in seconds before firing can begin. Prevents immediate firing in certain situations such as after spawning or switching weapons.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.fireRate
member.summary: Time interval between automatic weapon shots in seconds. Default value of 0.0334 provides approximately 30 shots per second. Can be modified by power-ups through ValueOrchestrator.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.firedWhileInvulnerable
member.summary: Tracks if the player fired weapons during invulnerability period. When true, immediately cancels invulnerability as a penalty for aggressive play during spawn protection. Encourages defensive play after respawning.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.gibThreshold
member.summary: Health threshold below which the unit will gib instead of playing death animation (default -10). When health drops below this value from damage, the unit explodes into pieces. More negative values require more overkill damage to trigger gibbing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.gibs
member.summary: Reference to the GibHolder containing gore particle prefabs for this character. Used when the unit is gibbed to spawn appropriate blood and body part effects. Each character can have unique gib sets for visual variety.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hasPlayedMissSound
member.summary: Prevents multiple miss sound effects from playing for a single melee attack. Reset when canceling melee or starting a new attack.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.heroThatKilledMeIndex
member.summary: Player index of the hero that killed this unit (default -1 for no killer). Used for respawn positioning to place the unit near their killer. Also used for kill attribution in statistics and scoring systems.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.iDiedAtPosition
member.summary: World position where this unit died (default Vector3.zero). Stored for respawn calculations and death statistics. Used with heroThatKilledMeIndex to determine optimal respawn location near the action.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.impaledByChainSaw
member.summary: Indicates if character is impaled by a chainsaw. Field is declared but not used in TestVanDammeAnim.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.impalementCollider
member.summary: GameObject reference to the collider used for impalement mechanics. Destroyed when cleanup is needed to prevent physics conflicts. Handles collision detection for impalement death scenarios.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.jumpingMelee
member.summary: Indicates the character is performing a melee attack while jumping or airborne. Set by SetMeleeType() based on action state, determines aerial melee animations and physics.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastAlertTime
member.summary: Tracks when the character last alerted nearby enemies. Prevents alert spam with minimum 0.07 seconds between alerts. Only alerts when character is alive and not in stealth mode.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.meleeChosenUnit
member.summary: Stores the target unit for melee attacks. Set when a valid melee target is found nearby and used to calculate movement toward the target during the melee animation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.meleeFollowUp
member.summary: Indicates whether a melee combo or follow-up attack is allowed. Set to false in CancelMelee(), checked with dashingMelee to control combo behavior.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.meleeHasHit
member.summary: Tracks whether the current melee attack has successfully connected with a target. Prevents multiple damage applications from a single melee attack.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.projectileTime
member.summary: Timestamp preventing immediate detonation of remote projectiles after firing. Set to Time.time when firing remote explosives. Prevents accidental self-destruction by requiring 0.56 seconds to elapse before detonation is allowed.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.remoteCar
member.summary: Reference to a remote control car currently being controlled by this character. When set, player input controls the car instead of the character. Provides reference for remote vehicle mechanics. Cleared when car is destroyed or control ends.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.remoteProjectile
member.summary: Reference to a projectile currently under remote control by this character. When set, character can detonate or guide the projectile. Cleared when projectile is destroyed or control is released. Used for remote-controlled explosives gameplay.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.skinnedMookOnMyBack
member.summary: Reference to a skinned mook attached to the character's back. When set (not null), reduces horizontal movement speed by 5% (multiplies by 0.95).

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.specialCounter
member.summary: Controls timing for special ability usage. Similar to fireCounter but for special attacks. Initialized to 0.0667 seconds.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.standingMelee
member.summary: Indicates the character is performing a melee attack while standing or grounded. Set by SetMeleeType() based on action state, determines ground melee animations.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.willComeBackToLife
member.summary: Indicates this unit will resurrect after death. When true, displays a halo effect above the corpse and prevents certain death cleanup operations. The resurrection occurs after willComebackToLifeTime expires.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.willComebackToLifeTime
member.summary: Countdown timer in seconds until resurrection occurs. Set when unit dies with willComeBackToLife active. Decremented each frame while dead, triggering resurrection and full health restoration when reaching zero.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddSpecialAmmo
member.summary: Increases special ammunition by 1 if below maximum capacity and updates the HeroController with the new value.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AirDashDown
member.summary: Initiates a downward slam air dash with an extended duration (5x normal), starting with a slight upward movement before transitioning to a powerful downward motion.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AirDashLeft
member.summary: Initiates a leftward air dash with a two-phase execution: a charge-up delay followed by the actual dash. The dash grants brief invulnerability and enables downward dashing afterwards.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AirDashRight
member.summary: Initiates a rightward air dash with a two-phase execution: a charge-up delay followed by the actual dash. The dash grants brief invulnerability and enables downward dashing afterwards.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AirDashUp
member.summary: Performs an instant upward air dash without charge-up delay, launching the character upward with 150% jump force for a shorter duration than horizontal dashes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Airdash(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Main air dash input handler that checks directional inputs and availability, then calls the appropriate directional dash method. Processes dashes in priority order: Right, Left, Down, Up.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayAidDashSound

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayAirDashChargeUpSound
member.summary: Virtual method for playing the air dash charge-up sound effect. Empty in base class, intended for override in derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ResetSpecialAmmo

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunAirDashing
member.summary: Central air dash controller that manages dash execution based on direction. Delegates to specific directional dash methods, counts down dash timer, and clamps velocities to normal ranges when dash completes. Special handling for upward dashes limits velocity to 80% jump force.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunDownwardDash
member.summary: Executes downward slam dash with accelerating descent. Uses complex velocity calculation that accelerates downward movement, triggers sound and visual effects when reaching -50 velocity threshold, and clamps final velocity between 1.25x max fall speed and 300 units.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunLeftAirDash

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunRightAirDash
member.summary: Executes rightward air dash with two-phase implementation. Delay phase: stops vertical movement and adds slight leftward anticipation movement. Dash phase: triggers animation change, plays dash sound, creates rightward poof effect, and calls SetAirDashRightSpeed.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunUpwardDash
member.summary: Executes upward air dash immediately without delay phase. Resets jump timer, applies 150% jump force for strong upward boost, and zeroes horizontal movement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetAirDashLeftSpeed
member.summary: Sets velocity for leftward air dash execution. Zeroes vertical movement and sets horizontal velocity to -2.3x normal speed for fast leftward movement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetAirDashRightSpeed
member.summary: Sets velocity for rightward air dash execution. Zeroes vertical movement and sets horizontal velocity to 2.3x normal speed for fast rightward movement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetAirdashAvailable

member.param: The projectile to be remotely controlled

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetSpecialAmmoRPC(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets special ammunition amount via RPC for network synchronization and updates the HeroController.
member.param: Amount of special ammunition to set

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StartPockettedSpecial
member.summary: Virtual method for initiating pocketed special ability. Empty in base class, designed for character-specific overrides to implement special weapon usage.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UseJetpack
member.summary: Activates jetpack thrust for vertical movement. Virtual method intended for override by jetpack-equipped heroes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UsePockettedSpecial
member.summary: Virtual method for using pocketed special abilities. Resets facing direction and can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UseSpecial
member.summary: Uses special ability (grenade throwing). Consumes special ammo, spawns grenade projectile with position-based trajectory, or flashes ammo indicator if depleted.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UseSteroidsNetworked
member.summary: Activates steroid power-up effects across the network. Virtual method intended for override by heroes with steroid abilities.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UseSteroidsNetworkedForDuration(System.Single)
member.summary: Activates steroid power-up effects for a specific duration across the network. Virtual method intended for override by heroes with timed steroid abilities.
member.param: Duration of the steroid effect in seconds

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.SpecialAmmo
member.summary: Gets or sets the current special ammunition count. Setting this property synchronizes the value across all clients when the unit is owned by the local player.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim._specialAmmo
member.summary: Current special ammunition count (backing field for SpecialAmmo property). Changes to this value are synchronized across the network via RPC calls.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.originalSpecialAmmo
member.summary: Default and maximum special ammunition capacity. Typically set to 3 but can be overridden (e.g., 6 for certain game modes). Used to initialize special ammo on spawn and check if ammo is full.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.pressSpecialFacingDirection
member.summary: Stores the character's facing direction when a special ability is activated. Used to lock facing direction during special abilities when turnAroundWhhileUsingSpecials is false. Reset when actions complete.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.specialGrenade
member.summary: Reference to the grenade prefab spawned when using special abilities. Different throwing trajectories are used based on whether the character is ducking or standing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.turnAroundWhhileUsingSpecials
member.summary: Controls whether the character can change facing direction while using special abilities. When false, the character's facing is locked to the direction they were facing when the special was activated. Defaults to true.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.usingPockettedSpecial
member.summary: Indicates the character is using a stored or pocketed special ability. Often set and cleared together with the main usingSpecial flag and affects animation states.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.usingSpecial
member.summary: Indicates the character is currently performing a special ability animation. Set true when special is pressed, false when animation completes or is interrupted by acid/remote control. Takes priority in animation selection.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.usingSpecial2
member.summary: Secondary special ability input state, primarily used by AI enemies. Checked as part of the IsUsingSpecial condition for determining if any special ability is active.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.usingSpecial3
member.summary: Tertiary special ability input state, primarily used by AI enemies. Part of the multi-special ability system that allows AI to have different special attacks.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.usingSpecial4
member.summary: Quaternary special ability input state, primarily used by AI enemies. Provides a fourth special ability option for complex AI behavior patterns.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasUsingSpecial
member.summary: Previous frame's primary special ability state. Used for edge detection to determine when special abilities are first activated.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasUsingSpecial2
member.summary: Previous frame's secondary special ability state. Used for edge detection of AI special ability inputs.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasUsingSpecial3
member.summary: Previous frame's tertiary special ability state. Used for edge detection of AI special ability inputs.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasUsingSpecial4
member.summary: Previous frame's quaternary special ability state. Used for edge detection to trigger AI special abilities on button press.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddParentedDiff(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Adds positional differences to the character's coordinates. Only applies differences if the unit is owned locally or synchronization is disabled.
member.param: The horizontal position difference to apply.
The vertical position difference to apply.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddSpeedLeft
member.summary: Accelerates the character leftward with speed limits and multipliers based on movement state. Base acceleration is 2x, dashing provides 4x, and parachute reduces speed by 50%. Includes an extra 2.6x boost when below maximum speed.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AddSpeedRight
member.summary: Accelerates the character rightward with speed limits and multipliers based on movement state. Base acceleration is 2x, dashing provides 4x, and parachute reduces speed by 50%. Includes an extra 2.6x boost when below maximum speed.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AirJump
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for air jump/double jump mechanics. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement air jumping behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ApplyFallingGravity
member.summary: Applies gravity based on character state. Skips gravity during chimney flips when constrained or while climbing ladders. Applies specialized gravity for parachute (17% when falling, 33% when rising, plus horizontal damping), quicksand, or normal conditions.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ApplyNormalGravity
member.summary: Applies standard gravity with modifiers for fluid submersion and high-five boost effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ApplyQuicksandGravity
member.summary: Applies special gravity behavior in quicksand. Clamps Y velocity between -80 and 50, then smoothly transitions velocity toward -2 units/sec for alive characters or -1 unit/sec for dead characters.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AssignGroundTransform(UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Assigns and tracks the transform of the ground or platform the character is standing on. Stores local position offset for proper movement synchronization with moving platforms. Handles special notifications for blocks when being stood on.
member.param: The ground transform to assign as the current standing surface

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AssignParentedPos
member.summary: Stores the current position relative to the parent transform for tracking movement between frames.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AssignWallTransform(UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Assigns the wall transform for wall climbing mechanics. Stores the wall reference and calculates the character's local position relative to the wall for proper climbing movement.
member.param: The wall transform to assign for climbing

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AttachToZipline(ZipLine)
member.summary: Attaches character to zipline for transportation. Sets zipline state and disables normal movement controls.
member.param: ZipLine object to attach to

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CalculateCollumnRowFromTransform
member.summary: Updates the unit's grid position based on its transform position. Sets X and Y from transform and recalculates grid coordinates.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CalculateGridPosition
member.summary: Converts world position to grid coordinates for tile-based game mechanics. Updates the character's row and column values based on 16-unit grid size.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CalculateGroundHeight
member.summary: Updates the ground height for the character by calling GetGroundHeightGround to perform ground detection calculations.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CalculateMovement
member.summary: Core movement calculation method that processes all character input and physics. Handles wind effects, sandstorm damage, firing input, dash detection, directional movement with double-tap dash triggers, air dashes during high-five holds, action state transitions, edge slip prevention, down input processing with parachute deactivation, and comprehensive jump mechanics including wall jumps, quicksand jumps, wall climbing initiation, and air jump grace periods.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanAirDash(DirectionEnum)
member.summary: Determines if character can perform air dash in specified direction based on character state and directional availability. Returns true if character can air dash or is on ground, false if dead, acid-covered, or direction unavailable.
member.param: Direction to check for air dash availability (Up, Down, Left, Right)
member.returns: True if air dash is possible in the specified direction, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanBeAffectedByWind
member.summary: Determines if character can be affected by wind effects. Returns false during chimney flip to prevent wind interference with the maneuver.
member.returns: True if character can be affected by wind, false during chimney flip

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanJumpOffGround
member.summary: Determines if character can jump from current ground position by checking for solid ground contact with wall collision considerations. Accounts for directional movement restrictions and quicksand movement penalties.
member.returns: True if character can jump from current position, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanTouchGround(System.Single)
member.summary: Checks if the character can touch ground using multiple raycasts at different positions. Performs up to 4 raycasts for regular ground and 4 additional raycasts for ladders if applicable.
member.param: Horizontal offset for additional raycast checks.
member.returns: True if any raycast hits ground or ladder, false otherwise.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckDucking
member.summary: Advanced ducking logic that handles auto-ducking in tight spaces. Checks for ceiling and floor constraints, auto-ducks when running into low passages, and stops ducking when space becomes available.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ClampSpeedPressingLeft
member.summary: Clamps horizontal velocity to -10 when pressing left without simultaneous right input to ensure responsive leftward movement initiation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ClampSpeedPressingRight
member.summary: Clamps horizontal velocity to 10 when pressing right without simultaneous left input to ensure responsive rightward movement initiation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ClampWallDragYI(System.Single@)
member.summary: Limits vertical velocity during wall dragging to control sliding speed. Prevents upward movement and clamps minimum falling speed to -40 units.
member.param: Reference to vertical velocity to be clamped

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ConstrainSpeedToSidesOfScreen
member.summary: Enforces screen boundaries to prevent the character from moving outside the playable area, with special handling for repositioning fallen players.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DontSlipOverEdges
member.summary: Prevents heroes from accidentally falling off edges by detecting ground ahead and stopping movement. Uses raycast detection based on facing direction to check for ground at feet width distance, stopping rolling and zeroing velocity when edge detected.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.EvaluateIsJumping
member.summary: Determines if the character should be in a jumping state by checking if they are more than 0.1 units above the ground. Only evaluates when ground height is valid (not -100000).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetFollowPosition
member.summary: Returns the position for the camera to follow, accounting for parachute state. During parachute deployment, returns a position with temporary Y value to smooth camera movement.
member.returns: The world position the camera should follow

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetGroundHeightGround
member.summary: Calculates the ground height below the character using box casts and raycasts. Checks for both regular ground and ladders, updating ground references and footstep sound types based on what is detected.
member.returns: The highest ground point found, or -200f if no ground is detected.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetGroundLayer
member.summary: Returns the appropriate layer mask for ground detection based on whether the player is holding down. When not holding down, includes platforms; when holding down, excludes platforms to allow dropping through.
member.returns: LayerMask combining ground, fragile, and optionally platform layers.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetParentedToPos
member.summary: Calculates the character's position relative to their parent transform, used for maintaining relative positioning on moving platforms.
member.returns: The character's position in parent transform space, or world position if not parented.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetParentedToTransform
member.summary: Returns the current parent transform in order of priority: impaled transform, wall climb transform, or ground transform.
member.returns: The active parent transform, or null if not parented to anything.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HitLeftWall
member.summary: Virtual method called when character collides with left wall. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes for wall collision handling.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HitRightWall
member.summary: Virtual method called when character collides with right wall. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes for wall collision handling.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsGroundBelow
member.summary: Simple ground detection with fixed 5-unit range using two raycasts from left and right foot positions.
member.returns: True if either foot detects ground within 5 units below.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsGroundBelow(System.Single)
member.summary: Parameterized ground detection with variable range using two raycasts from foot positions.
member.param: Maximum distance to check for ground below the character.
member.returns: True if either foot detects ground within the specified distance.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsGroundBelowAtXOffset(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ground detection at a specific horizontal offset from the character position, useful for checking ground ahead or behind.
member.param: Horizontal offset from character position to check.
Whether to include ladder detection in addition to ground.
member.returns: True if ground (and optionally ladders) detected at the offset position.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsNearGround(System.Single)
member.summary: Checks if the character is within a specified distance from the ground.
member.param: Maximum distance above ground to consider "near".
member.returns: True if the character's Y position is below ground height plus the offset.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsOilyBelow
member.summary: Detects if there are oily surfaces beneath the character using two raycasts from foot positions. Checks 9 units down from Y+4 position with foot spread of 4 units.
member.returns: True if either foot position detects an oily block below.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsOnGround
member.summary: Determines if the character is standing on ground by checking if Y position is within 0.5 units above ground height and vertical velocity is not positive.
member.returns: True if the character is on ground, false otherwise.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsWallInFront(System.Single)
member.summary: Detects if there's a wall in front of the character at waist height using raycasting. Used for wall detection in movement and climbing systems.
member.param: The distance to check for walls
member.returns: True if a wall is detected within the specified distance

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsWallInFrontOfHead(System.Single)
member.summary: Detects if there's a wall at head height (Y position + 17 units) using raycasting. Used to prevent movement into walls at head level.
member.param: The distance to check for walls
member.returns: True if a wall is detected at head height within the specified distance

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Jump(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Handles all jump mechanics including wall jumps and special surface interactions. Sets jump force to 80% when surrounded by barbed wire, 190% for bouncy blocks during grace period, or normal jump force otherwise. Inherits velocity from moving platforms. Wall jumps reset horizontal velocity and trigger climb animations.
member.param: If true, performs a wall jump with horizontal velocity reset and climb sound/animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.NotPressingJump
member.summary: Processes jump button release by disabling wall climbing state when jump is not being pressed.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.OpenParachute
member.summary: Activates the parachute if not already active. Sets the IsParachuteActive flag to true.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ParachuteLandedOn
member.summary: Called when another object lands on this unit's parachute. Virtual method intended for override by specific implementations.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PressDown
member.summary: Handles down button press input by recording the tap time for potential down-based actions.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RaycastGroundSingleSquare(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Helper method that performs a single raycast for ground detection. Casts from 8 units above character position with 12 unit ray length.
member.param: The direction to cast the ray (typically Vector3.down)
member.returns: True if ground is detected within range, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ResetToOriginalJumpForce
member.summary: Restores the original jump force and clears the attack jump force timer if previously modified.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunAirFriction
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for air friction. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement air resistance.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunCheckHanging
member.summary: Detects if character can hang from ceiling using upward raycasts. Requires 0.8 seconds after jump, appropriate directional conditions, and ceiling detection within range. Sets vertical velocity based on ceiling distance and tracks interactive ceiling objects.
member.returns: True if hanging conditions are met and ceiling is detected.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunDeadGravity
member.summary: Applies physics when character is dead. In air: applies gravity or quicksand gravity unless impaled, triggers falling animation at -50 velocity. On ground: applies friction using 10x friction multiplier.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunFallen
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for post-fall state behavior. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement custom fallen state logic.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunFalling
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for falling state behavior. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement custom falling logic.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunGroundFriction
member.summary: Applies friction when character is on ground and idle. Normal friction rapidly decelerates at 25x rate, while rolling friction is slower at 5x rate.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunHanging
member.summary: Manages movement and physics while hanging from ceiling. Provides slight upward movement with up/jump input, applies horizontal speed clamping based on animation frame, increases friction when not moving, and continuously checks for ceiling presence. Automatically stops hanging when ceiling is lost or down is pressed.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunImpaledMovement
member.summary: Handles movement constraints when the character is impaled by an object. Checks if the impaling object still exists, manages blood effects, and evaluates if the character should remain in the impaled state.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunMovement
member.summary: Central movement processing hub that orchestrates all character movement based on action state. Handles dead state physics with quicksand damping, ladder and zipline mechanics, jump timing and gravity application, water physics damping, comprehensive collision detection for walls/ceilings/floors, out-of-bounds death triggers, and frame-based movement calculations. This is the core method that drives all character physics and movement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunStrungByPredabroMovement
member.summary: Handles special movement when the character is caught by a Predabro enemy. Positions the character below the predabro with a -24 Y offset (additional -5 for MookBigGuy) and zeros out velocity while caught.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetActionStateToJumping(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Changes the character's action state to jumping. Requires health > 0 and not already jumping, OR forced parameter is true. Updates animation frame unless using special ability.
member.param: If true, bypasses the check for already being in jump state.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetActionstateToIdle
member.summary: Sets the character's action state to idle. Simple state transition method that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetCanParachute(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables parachute capability with appropriate delay setup. When enabling, stores camera Y position and sets delay (0.15s for players, 0.6s for NPCs). When disabling, deactivates the parachute.
member.param: Whether parachute use is allowed

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetParachuteDelay(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the delay before the parachute can be deployed. Used to prevent immediate parachute use after certain actions.
member.param: Delay in seconds before parachute can be used

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetPositionAndVelocity(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the position and velocity of TestVanDammeAnim with teleportation handling. If the distance change exceeds 6 units, directly sets position to prevent large jumps.
member.param: New X coordinate position
New Y coordinate position
X velocity component
Y velocity component

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ShiftUnitWithParent
member.summary: Updates the character's position based on parent transform movement, applying the difference between frames.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StartDucking
member.summary: Initiates ducking state and adjusts collision heights. Sets ducking flag, updates height values, cancels hanging state, and triggers animation update.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopAirDashing
member.summary: Cancels air dash state and resets related variables. Clears chimney flip animation frames and air dash timers.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopDashing
member.summary: Manages dash speed multiplier cleanup when ending dash sequences. Resets dash speed to 1.0 for grounded characters while preserving last dash speed for airborne characters to maintain momentum.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopDucking
member.summary: Exits ducking state if conditions allow. Checks if player is still holding down while standing still and restores standing height values.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TeleportOnScreenCounter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a delay counter for teleporting the hero back on screen when they fall below the visible area. Used to give a grace period before forcibly bringing off-screen players back into play.
member.param: Number of frames to wait before teleporting back on screen

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Tumble
member.summary: Virtual method placeholder for tumble mechanics. Empty in base class, allows subclasses to implement tumbling behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UseAttackJumpForceForSeconds(System.Single)
member.summary: Temporarily increases jump force to attack jump force for a specified duration. Stores original jump force for restoration.
member.param: Duration in seconds to use the enhanced jump force

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.GetSpeed
member.summary: Gets the effective movement speed considering all active modifiers and environmental effects. Speed is reduced by 50% when surrounded by barbed wire.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.IsStandingStill
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the character is completely stationary. Returns true when the character is on the ground and both X and Y velocities are below 0.5.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.XY
member.summary: Gets or sets the character's position as a Vector2. This override provides network synchronization hooks for the base class position property.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.jumpForce
member.summary: Gets or sets the force applied when the character jumps. This value can be temporarily modified for special attack jumps.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.GRAVITY
member.summary: Standard gravity constant of 1100 units/secondÂ² used for character physics. Note: While defined as a constant, the codebase often uses the literal value 1100f instead of referencing this constant. Represents downward acceleration for all characters.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.JUMP_TIME
member.summary: Duration in seconds that jump force is applied when the jump button is held. Default 0.123 seconds allows for variable jump heights. Used to calculate upward velocity during jumps. Can be modified per-character for different jump behaviors.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim._jumpForce
member.summary: Private backing field for the jumpForce property. Stores the base jump force value in units per second. Default value is 260.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.airDashDelay
member.summary: Controls the delay/charge-up time before an air dash executes. Set to defaultAirdashDelay when initiating a dash and counts down during the charge phase. Provides invulnerability during the delay period.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.airdashDirection
member.summary: Tracks which direction the current air dash is going. Can be Right, Left, Up, Down, or Any. Affects movement physics during the dash execution.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.airdashDownAvailable
member.summary: Tracks if downward air dash is available. Set to true by SetAirdashAvailable and disabled after use. Downward dashes use a 5x duration multiplier for extended effect.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.airdashLeftAvailable
member.summary: Tracks if leftward air dash is available. Set to true by SetAirdashAvailable and disabled after use to prevent repeated air dashes until landing or wall climbing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.airdashMaxTime
member.summary: Maximum duration of an air dash in seconds. Base value of 0.5 seconds is multiplied by 0.8x for upward dashes (shorter) and 5x for downward dashes (longer slam).

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.airdashRightAvailable
member.summary: Tracks if rightward air dash is available. Set to true by SetAirdashAvailable and disabled after use to create a one-dash-per-direction aerial movement system.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.airdashTime
member.summary: Timer controlling air dash duration and availability. Set to airdashMaxTime when initiating dash and decrements each frame. Different dash types use different multipliers (up=0.8x, down=5x).

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.airdashUpAvailable
member.summary: Tracks if upward air dash is available. Set to true by SetAirdashAvailable and disabled after use to prevent repeated air dashes in the same direction until reset.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.attackJumpForce
member.summary: Alternative jump force used during attack moves. Applied temporarily via UseAttackJumpForceForSeconds method to create special attack jump mechanics.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.attackJumpForceSecondsRemaining
member.summary: Timer for temporary jump force modifications during special attacks. While greater than or equal to 0, overrides normal jump force with attackJumpForce. Counts down each frame and resets to -1 when expired.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.belowScreenCounter
member.summary: Timer tracking how long unit has been below screen bottom. Incremented when Y position is 30 units below screenMinY. Triggers repositioning when exceeding 2 seconds.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.bouncyJumpMultiplyer
member.summary: Multiplier constant (1.9x) intended for bouncy/spring jump mechanics. Currently defined but not actively used in TestVanDammeAnim. May be utilized by derived classes for special jump behaviors on trampolines or springs.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canAirdash
member.summary: Master toggle for air dash ability. When true, allows the character to perform directional air dashes. Used by characters like Nebro, BroLee, and TheBrocketeer.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canCeilingHang
member.summary: Allows the character to hang from ceilings. When true, enables hanging when near ceiling with up/jump input. Used by special characters like ScorpionBro.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canDash
member.summary: Master toggle for dashing ability. Default is true. When false, prevents all dash moves and affects ladder climbing behavior (cannot climb ladders while dashing).

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canPushBlocks
member.summary: Controls whether the character can push moveable blocks. Default is true. Only allows pushing when running or climbing ladders. Triggers Map.PushBlock when conditions are met.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canTouchCeiling
member.summary: Controls whether unit can collide with ceilings. Set by ConstrainToCeiling method and affects wall drag behavior. Protected field for internal collision state.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canTouchLeftWalls
member.summary: Allows or blocks collision with left walls. Public field for external collision control. Referenced in barbed wire collision checks.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canTouchRightWalls
member.summary: Allows or blocks collision with right walls. Public field for external collision control. Works with canTouchLeftWalls for directional collision management.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canWallClimb
member.summary: Determines if the character can climb walls. Default is true but can be disabled for certain character types. Also used by the AI pathfinding system to determine movement options.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ceilingHeight
member.summary: Height of ceiling above character. Updated by upward raycast checks from center and both sides. Default value of 1000 indicates no ceiling. Used for vertical space calculations and movement constraints.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.chimneyFlip
member.summary: Indicates whether the player is currently performing a chimney flip wall-jump maneuver. Set to true when initiating the flip, false when animation completes or air dash stops.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.chimneyFlipConstrained
member.summary: Determines whether horizontal movement is restricted during a chimney flip. When true, horizontal movement is limited unless up/jump is held.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.chimneyFlipDirection
member.summary: Horizontal direction of chimney flip (-1 for left, 1 for right). Multiplied by 100 to set horizontal velocity during the flip maneuver.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.chimneyFlipFrames
member.summary: Animation frame counter for chimney flip, starting at 11 and counting down to 0. Used to calculate animation frame (22 - chimneyFlipFrames) and control movement restrictions.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.constrainedLeft
member.summary: Indicates collision with wall on left side during current frame. Set true when raycast detects left wall collision. Works with constrainedRight for full wall detection.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.constrainedRight
member.summary: Indicates collision with wall on right side during current frame. Set true when raycast detects right wall collision. Used for ceiling hang transitions and wall interaction mechanics.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.dashSpeedM
member.summary: Current air dash speed multiplier (default 1.0). Increased during air dashes to provide burst movement. Value changes dynamically during dash execution and returns to 1.0 when dash ends.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.dashTime
member.summary: Timestamp marking when the current dash started. Set when initiating a dash after successful double-tap detection.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.dashing
member.summary: Current dash state of the character. When true, applies dash speed multiplier and triggers dash animations.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.defaultAirdashDelay
member.summary: The standard delay time in seconds before air dashes execute. Default value of 0.15 seconds provides consistency across different air dash types.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.delayedDashing
member.summary: Handles dash continuation after landing from an aerial state. When true, allows dash to resume upon landing if conditions are met.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.doodadCurrentlyHangingFrom
member.summary: Reference to the ceiling JiggleDoodad object the character is currently hanging from. Set when grabbing ceiling and used for physics interactions with environmental effects.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.doubleJumpsLeft
member.summary: Tracks remaining double jump charges. Always reset to 0 in the base implementation when landing, wall jumping, or entering various states. Actual double jump functionality appears to be implemented in derived classes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.downTapTime
member.summary: Timestamp of the last down direction button press. Set in PressDown() method, potentially used for ground pound or slide mechanics.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.feetWidth
member.summary: Width for foot collision detection in units. Default value of 4 used in ground detection raycasts. Adjusts based on movement direction for better platforming feel.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.frictionM
member.summary: Ground friction multiplier affecting horizontal deceleration. Default value of 10. Applied as xI *= (1 - Clamp01(t * frictionM)) when on ground. Higher values create faster deceleration.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.graceJumping
member.summary: Allows jump input buffering on bouncy blocks. Set to true when initiating jump and checked for bouncy block interactions to provide forgiving jump timing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.gravityWaterDanmping
member.summary: Unused constant intended for water gravity damping (0.5f). Currently not referenced in the codebase. The actual water damping is handled by separate waterDampingX (0.95f) and waterDampingY (0.65f) fields.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.groundHeight
member.summary: Current ground level below character. Updated by CalculateGroundHeight each frame. Core vertical reference point used for ground detection, fall damage calculations, and jumping mechanics.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.halfWidth
member.summary: Half of unit's collision width in units. Default value of 6 used throughout for wall collision boundaries, ledge detection, and constraint calculations. Returned by HalfWidth property.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hangGrace
member.summary: Grace period timer that allows the player to grab onto ceilings within a short window after moving away from a climbable surface. Initialized to hangGraceTime (0.3f) when near ceilings while jumping. Counts down each frame.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hangGraceTime
member.summary: Grace period for hanging mechanics in seconds. Default value of 0.3 sets hangGrace timer when detecting hang points. Multiplied by 1.33x for upward hangs.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hasDashedInAir
member.summary: Tracks whether the player has already performed a dash while airborne in the current jump. Prevents multiple air dashes until landing, reset to false upon touching ground.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.jumpTime
member.summary: Multi-purpose timer for jump-related mechanics. Set to 0.13 seconds at the start of a standard jump and controls jump boost duration. Also prevents wall climbing immediately after jumping. Different jump types use values between 0.03-0.07 seconds.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastCollumn
member.summary: Previous grid column position. Updated when grid position changes and compared with current collumn to detect movement between grid cells. Note: Field name contains spelling error ("Collumn" instead of "Column").

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastDashSpeedM
member.summary: Previous frame's dash speed multiplier value. Used for smooth interpolation of dash speeds and to detect dash state changes. Helps create fluid dash animations and movement curves.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastJumpTime
member.summary: Timestamp of most recent jump action. Used for various jump cooldowns: 0.08s minimum between jumps, 0.2s for wall jumps, and 0.3s for ceiling grab attempts.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastLandTime
member.summary: Timestamp of the most recent ground landing. Used for "coyote time" or grace jumping, allowing jumps shortly after leaving a platform. Enables more forgiving platforming by permitting jumps within a small window after walking off ledges.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastParentPosition
member.summary: Intended to store previous parent position. Field exists but is never used in current implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastParentWorldPos
member.summary: Caches parent's world position for movement calculations. Used to calculate parentedDiff in ShiftUnitWithParent based on position changes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastParentedToTransform
member.summary: Tracks previous parent transform for detecting parent changes. Used to apply momentum when switching parents or leaving a moving platform. Set to null in Initialize.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastRow
member.summary: Previous grid row position. Field exists but usage not found in current implementation. Likely intended for grid-based movement tracking.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ledgeGrapple
member.summary: Indicates if the character is currently grabbing a ledge. Works with wasLedgeGrapple for state transition detection.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ledgeOffsetY
member.summary: Vertical offset applied when grabbing ledges. Used to calculate which animation frame to display during ledge grapple animations, with values typically ranging from 0 to 13.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.leftTapTime
member.summary: Timestamp of the last left direction button press. Used with minDashTapTime to detect left double-tap for dashing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.maxFallSpeed
member.summary: Terminal velocity limit for falling in units per second (default -400). Prevents acceleration beyond this speed when falling. Can be modified temporarily by abilities or environmental effects like fans or low gravity zones.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.maxWallClimbYI
member.summary: Maximum upward velocity allowed when initiating wall climbing. Default value of 100 prevents climbing at high speeds. Different units may have different values (e.g., Alien: 250).

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.minDashTapTime
member.summary: Maximum time window (0.33 seconds) between two directional taps to trigger a dash. If second tap occurs within this window, dash is initiated.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.noclipSpeed
member.summary: Movement speed when in level editor noclip mode. Default value of 200 units per second. Only active when Map.isEditing and LevelEditorGUI.NoClip are true. Speed increases while moving up to +300/sec.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.oldJumpForce
member.summary: Stores the original jump force value when temporarily modifying jump force for attack moves. Initialized to -1. Set in UseAttackJumpForceForSeconds() and restored in ResetToOriginalJumpForce(). The -1 value indicates no temporary modification is active.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.originalMaxFallSpeed
member.summary: Stores the default terminal velocity value (default -400). Used to restore normal falling physics after temporary modifications from abilities or effects. Ensures fall speed limits return to baseline after special states.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.parachuteTemporyPositionY
member.summary: Smooth Y-position interpolation for parachute deployment visuals. Initialized to camera position when parachute activates and gradually moves up toward actual position at 250 units/second. Creates smooth "pulling up" effect for attached visual elements.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.parentHasMovedTime
member.summary: Timer tracking when parent object has moved. Set to 0.5 seconds when parent moves and affects wall drag mechanics while positive. Decrements by delta time in RunMovement.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.parentVelocityInheritM
member.summary: Multiplier for inheriting velocity from parent objects. Default value of 1.0 applies full parent velocity. Used when unimpaling and in movement calculations. Reset to 1 after impalement ends.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.parentedDiff
member.summary: Movement difference calculated when parented to moving objects. Applied to unit position and transfers momentum (adds to xIBlast/yI) when leaving parent.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.rightTapTime
member.summary: Timestamp of the last right direction button press. Used with minDashTapTime to detect right double-tap for dashing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.rumbleAmountPerShot
member.summary: Controller vibration intensity per shot fired. Default value of 0.3. Intended for gamepad feedback but not actively used in base implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.screenMaxX
member.summary: Maximum X coordinate of current camera/screen boundary. Set via SetResolutionCamera.GetScreenExtents. Used for screen constraint checks and respawn positioning.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.screenMaxY
member.summary: Maximum Y coordinate of current camera/screen boundary. Set via SetResolutionCamera.GetScreenExtents. Used for top-of-screen constraints in MapExtents mode.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.screenMinX
member.summary: Minimum X coordinate of current camera/screen boundary. Set via SetResolutionCamera.GetScreenExtents. Used with screenMaxX to calculate screen center for respawning.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.screenMinY
member.summary: Minimum Y coordinate of current camera/screen boundary. Set via SetResolutionCamera.GetScreenExtents. Used to detect when character falls below screen (with 30 unit buffer).

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.specialAttackXIBoost
member.summary: Horizontal velocity boost applied during special attacks. Added to total velocity calculation to provide special move momentum.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.specialAttackYIBoost
member.summary: Vertical velocity boost applied during special attacks. Added to vertical velocity calculation to provide special move momentum.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.speed
member.summary: Base horizontal movement speed in units per second (default 110). Core value used throughout movement calculations for walking and running. Modified by various factors like terrain, status effects, and attached enemies.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.standingHeadHeight
member.summary: Default head height when standing in units. Default value of 18 sets initial headHeight and is restored when standing up from crouch.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useAttackJumpForceForAttack
member.summary: Flag indicating if special attack jump force should be used for attacks. Checked by AI systems to determine attack behavior and triggers temporary jump force modification.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallClimbing
member.summary: Current wall climbing state flag. Set true when initiating wall climb. Affects movement physics, animations, and special moves like air dash. Reset when leaving walls or transitioning states.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallClimbingWallTransform
member.summary: Reference to wall being climbed. Set in AssignWallTransform when touching walls and used as part of the parenting system. Reset to null in ShiftUnitWithParent.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallClimbingWallTransformLocalPos
member.summary: Local position on wall for climbing calculations. Set using InverseTransformPoint in AssignWallTransform and returned by GetParentedToPos during wall climbing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallDrag
member.summary: Indicates if the character is sliding down a wall. When set to true, triggers wall drag audio loop and can initiate wall climbing if conditions are met. Automatically deactivates parachute when wall dragging begins.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallDragTime
member.summary: Timer controlling wall sliding effect when touching walls. Set to 0.2 seconds on wall contact and prevents downward movement while active. Creates a brief "stick" effect that slows descent along walls.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasConstrainedLeft
member.summary: Previous frame's left wall collision state. Updated from constrainedLeft each frame. Used to detect wall release for state transitions.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasConstrainedRight
member.summary: Previous frame's right wall collision state. Updated from constrainedRight each frame. Used to detect wall release for state transitions like ceiling hanging.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasDashing
member.summary: Previous frame's dash state, used for state change detection. Compared with current dashing state to trigger dash start effects and sounds.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasLedgeGrapple
member.summary: Previous frame's ledge grapple state. Used for edge detection to determine when ledge grabbing begins or ends.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasWallClimbing
member.summary: Previous wall climbing state. Field exists but is never used in current implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasWallDragging
member.summary: Previous frame's wall drag state for transition detection. Updated from wallDrag each frame. Used to detect wall drag state changes and prevents immediate re-grabbing of walls after release.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.waterDampingX
member.summary: Horizontal movement damping factor when submerged in water. Default value of 0.95 multiplies xI and xIBlast velocities, creating water resistance.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.waterDampingY
member.summary: Vertical movement damping factor when submerged in water. Default value of 0.65 multiplies yIT velocity, creating stronger vertical water resistance than horizontal.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.xIAttackExtra
member.summary: Additional horizontal velocity during attack animations. Used by characters like BroLee for martial arts moves and BrocSnipes for sniper recoil. Reset to 0 after attacks complete.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.xIBlast
member.summary: Horizontal knockback velocity component from explosions and impacts. Clamped to [-200, 200] range and affected by water damping. Adds to total velocity calculation without affecting base movement.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.xIT
member.summary: Frame-interpolated horizontal movement distance. Calculated as (xI + xIBlast + xIAttackExtra + specialAttackXIBoost) * deltaTime. Modified by wall constraints and water damping. Reduced by 0.95x when carrying objects.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.yIBlast
member.summary: Vertical knockback velocity component from explosions. Set via SetVelocity method and added to vertical velocity with clamping. Creates upward or downward force from impacts.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.yIT
member.summary: Frame-interpolated vertical movement distance. Calculated as (yI + specialAttackYIBoost) * deltaTime each frame. Modified by water damping, constraints, and traps. Represents actual vertical position change per frame.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualDuckingRunning
member.summary: Specialized ducking run animation that uses an 8-frame cycle with foot effects every 4 frames. Adjusts gun position to (2f, -1f) to accommodate ducking pose and includes submersion checks for particle effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualIdleDuckingFrames
member.summary: Provides the base ducking idle animation with adjusted gun positioning. Similar to standing idle but uses a different frame and positions gun at offset (2f, -1f) to accommodate the ducking pose.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualIdleFrames
member.summary: Provides the base standing idle animation when the character is not performing any special actions. Activates gun, sets frame rate to 0.0667f, and displays a static pose. Conditionally sets gun sprite based on firing state.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualJumpingDuckingFrames
member.summary: Handles specific jumping animation frames when character is in ducking state during jump.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualJumpingFrames
member.summary: Manages complex jumping animation frames based on vertical and horizontal velocity. Supports three distinct velocity states: fast rising (yI > 20f), fast falling (yI < -55f), and normal jumping. Includes gun positioning and frame validation with different animations for varying movement speeds.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualNewRunningFrames
member.summary: Running animation with environmental responsiveness. Adjusts frame rate based on quicksand (3x slower) and barbed wire (2x slower) conditions. Generates foot particle effects every 4 frames when not submerged and plays footstep sounds. Supports dash animation states.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateAirdash
member.summary: Handles horizontal air dash animation with direction-based sprite selection and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateAirdashDown
member.summary: Handles downward air dash animation with specific sprite frames and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateChimneyFlip
member.summary: Handles chimney flip animation, which is the animation that plays when you jump towards a corner and go up and over it.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateHanging
member.summary: Handles hanging animation from ledges or ceilings with proper sprite positioning and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateHighFiveHold
member.summary: Handles animation for holding high-five gesture with proper timing and visual feedback.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateHighFiveRelease
member.summary: Handles animation for releasing/completing high-five gesture. Creates high five effects when successfulHighFive is true at frame 4. Uses different frame rates based on useNewHighFivingFrames flag.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateIdle
member.summary: Main idle animation dispatcher that routes to specific animations based on character state. Implements a priority hierarchy system that handles ducking versus standing states separately. Routes to appropriate sub-animations including melee, high-five, special abilities, rolling, gestures, and dancing based on current character flags.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateImpaled
member.summary: Handles impalement animation with different frames for living versus dead characters. Living characters use a clamped frame range, while dead characters or aliens use a specific static frame. Deactivates gun and resets sprite offset during impalement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateImpaledByChainSaw
member.summary: Sets a specific animation frame for chainsaw impalement death. Deactivates the gun and resets sprite offset. Simpler than regular impalement animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateJumping
member.summary: Handles jumping animation sequences including takeoff, flight, and landing preparation phases.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateLedgeGrapple
member.summary: Handles ledge grappling animation with grabbing and climbing motion sequences.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateMelee
member.summary: Virtual method for melee attack animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateOnBackOffUnit
member.summary: Sets the sprite frame for when the character is backing away from another unit.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimatePockettedSpecial
member.summary: Executes pocketed special ability animation sequence. Manages 10-frame animation cycle, triggers ability execution at frame 4, and handles gun deactivation/reactivation throughout the sequence.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimatePushing
member.summary: Animates character pushing objects with specialized timing and gun orientation. Uses 3x slower frame rate than normal running, flips gun sprite horizontally (scale -1f on X-axis), and uses a specific sprite sheet row. Plays footstep sounds every 4 frames.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateRolling
member.summary: Animates the rolling sequence using a countdown-based frame system. Sets frame rate to 0.025f, deactivates the gun during rolling, and plays landing sound at frame 7 of the sequence.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateRunning
member.summary: Main running animation dispatcher with comprehensive state priority system. Handles throwable objects, melee, special abilities, pushing, and rolling states. For base running, generates environmental effects including foot particles and sounds. Adapts frame rate for quicksand environments.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial
member.summary: Handles special ability animation sequences. Manages timing, facing direction, and animation state for special moves.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial2
member.summary: Virtual method for secondary special ability animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial3
member.summary: Virtual method for tertiary special ability animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial4
member.summary: Virtual method for quaternary special ability animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateStrungUpFrames
member.summary: Sets the sprite animation frame for when the character is strung up or hanged. Displays a static death pose frame.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateThrowingHeldObject
member.summary: Handles animation for throwing held objects like grenades or mooks. Sets throwing state and manages object release timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateZipline
member.summary: Handles zipline traversal animation with movement-based sprite selection. Creates blood particles for gut ziplines or grinding sparks for regular ziplines when sliding. Deactivates gun during horizontal movement, activates it when stationary.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CreateFaderTrailInstance
