member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.playerBubble
member.summary: Gets the ReactionBubble instance appropriate for this player's number. Returns the corresponding bubble UI element based on the player's assigned number.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ElgilbleToBeKicked
member.summary: Whether this player can be kicked by teammates for being idle. Set true after 15 seconds of no input with 2+ players. Reset to false on any input. Note: Field name contains typo (should be "Eligible").

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.broMustFailToWin
member.summary: Marks bros that must fail or die to satisfy certain win conditions. When true, disables normal gibbing (sets canGib false) and only allows death from OutOfBounds damage. Used for special game modes or scenarios.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hasBeenKicked
member.summary: Tracks whether the unit has been kicked by another character. Set to true in KickRPC when kick is received. Prevents duplicate kick processing and triggers kick animation and bubble display.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.heldGrenade
member.summary: Reference to grenade currently held by character for throwing back. Enables grenade catch-and-throw mechanics. Used to calculate throw velocity based on grenade weight.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.heldMook
member.summary: Reference to enemy (Mook) currently held by character. Enables enemy grab-and-throw mechanics. Position updates applied to held mook during carry.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.isOnHelicopter
member.summary: Indicates whether the hero has boarded the extraction helicopter at level completion. Set to true when entering helicopter, changes playerNum to 5 for special handling. Used to track successful level extraction.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.kickPlayerBubble
member.summary: Visual indicator shown above idle players that can be kicked by teammates. Changes material/color based on kick state. Only appears in multiplayer with 2+ players after 15 seconds of inactivity.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastPathingTime
member.summary: Timestamp of last AI pathfinding attempt. Enforces 0.1 second cooldown between pathfinding requests to prevent excessive calculations.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.nearbyMook
member.summary: Reference to closest enemy available for interaction. Set to skinned mook on back if present, otherwise searches for nearby mook. Used for grab/interaction targeting.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.onBackOf
member.summary: Reference to another unit this unit is riding on (piggyback riding). Used for special movement mechanics when one character carries another.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.pathingAttempts
member.summary: Counter for AI pathfinding attempts. Incremented on each attempt and stops trying after 10 attempts to prevent infinite loops. Reset when command completes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.pilottedUnit
member.summary: Reference to the vehicle or unit currently being piloted by this character. Set when entering vehicles, cleared when exiting. When set, modifies UI display and input handling. Serialized for network synchronization.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.throwingHeldObject
member.summary: Indicates if character is currently in throwing animation. Set true when starting throw and false when completed. Controls throwing animation state.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ActivateGun
member.summary: Shows the gun sprite by setting it active. Counterpart to DeactivateGun, used to restore weapon visibility after states that hide it. Includes null check for safety.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CalculateCeilingHeight
member.summary: Calculates the height of the ceiling above the character using three upward raycasts (center, left, right). Returns the lowest ceiling point found, which is used for death animations to prevent visual clipping through level geometry.
member.returns: Height in units to the nearest ceiling above the character

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanReduceLives
member.summary: Determines whether lives should be reduced when this character dies. Returns true for non-zombie characters, allowing normal life deduction. Zombie characters return false to prevent life loss on death.
member.returns: True if lives should be reduced on death, false for zombies

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DeactivateGun
member.summary: Hides the gun sprite by setting it inactive. Used during death sequences, frozen states, and other situations where the weapon should not be visible. Includes null check for safety.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetFootPoofColor
member.summary: Determines appropriate particle effect color based on environmental ground conditions. Uses priority-based detection: oil takes precedence over quicksand, which takes precedence over pool submersion. Returns BloodColor.None for normal ground.
member.returns: BloodColor enum value representing the appropriate particle effect color for current environment

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.NotifyDeathType
member.summary: Reports the character's death type to the statistics system for analytics tracking. Uses an internal flag to ensure the death is only reported once, preventing duplicate statistics entries.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PackState(UnityStream)
member.summary: Serializes character state for network synchronization. Packs piloted unit, action state, and health. For heroes, also includes player number, hero type, and piloted unit again (serialized twice for heroes).
member.param: The network stream to write data to
member.returns: The stream with packed data

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunOnlineBadSpawnFailSafe
member.summary: Prevents bad spawn situations in online multiplayer for hero characters. Runs periodic checks to ensure proper spawn state when not hosting.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetGunPosition(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Positions the gun sprite relative to the character with specified offsets. Sets gun transform position and ensures consistent scale (1,1,1) while maintaining proper rendering depth (-0.001f on Z-axis).
member.param: Horizontal offset for gun positioning relative to character
Vertical offset for gun positioning relative to character

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetRenderers(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Toggles all child MeshRenderer components on or off. Finds all MeshRenderers in children including inactive ones and sets their enabled state.
member.param: Whether to enable or disable the renderers

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopPlayerBubbles
member.summary: Deactivates all player indicator UI bubbles including player number bubbles (1-4) and the high-five interaction bubble. Only runs for player-controlled characters and calls StopBubble on each active bubble to hide them.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TryAssignHeroThatKilledMe(UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour)
member.summary: Tracks which hero killed this unit for statistics and scoring purposes. Only assigns if not already set, extracts the player number from the damage sender, and stores the death position for kill tracking statistics.
member.param: The MonoBehaviour (typically a hero) that killed this unit

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UnpackState(UnityStream)
member.summary: Deserializes network state and applies it to the character. Unpacks all data from PackState with special handling for BoondockBro and Desperabro. Sets up hero if alive or deactivates gun if dead.
member.param: The network stream to read data from
member.returns: The stream after reading data

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.HalfWidth
member.summary: Gets the half-width of the character's collision bounds. This value is used for collision detection and positioning calculations.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.SyncParent
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent Transform for network synchronization. This property enables synchronized parenting across multiplayer clients.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.SyncParentedPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position relative to a parent Transform for network synchronization. This property manages both position and parent relationship in multiplayer scenarios.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim._counter
member.summary: General purpose time counter field. Currently has no specific usage in TestVanDammeAnim base implementation. Available for derived classes to use for custom timing needs or animation sequences.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim._spawnFailSafeTimer
member.summary: Network synchronization failsafe timer for spawn validation. Initialized with random value 0-0.5 seconds, then counts up. When reaching 1 second, checks if hero is too far from the rightmost hero (>1.3x camera width). If so, teleports to rightmost hero's position to resolve spawn failures.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AttachToHeli
member.summary: Virtual method for attaching TestVanDammeAnim to helicopter. Currently empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetUpHero(System.Int32,HeroType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures TestVanDammeAnim as a hero character with specified player number and hero type. Optionally registers with HeroController and creates hero indicator effects based on game state conditions.
member.param: The player number to assign to this hero (0-3)
The type of hero this character represents
Whether to register this hero with the HeroController system

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ShowStartBubble
member.summary: Displays the starting bubble UI for heroes when HUDs are enabled and character is alive. Restarts bubble animation and flashes avatar.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.disarmedGunMaterial
member.summary: Material applied to gun sprite to indicate disarmed state during reward phase. Only applied to non-winning players in multiplayer matches. Provides visual feedback that the character's weapon is disabled.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.faderSpritePrefab
member.summary: Prefab reference for creating fade effect sprites. Used to access FaderSprite component for visual fade transitions. Enables smooth visual transitions for various game states.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.heroType
member.summary: Identifies which specific hero character this instance represents (e.g., Rambro, Brominator). Set during hero setup and used for death statistics, special behaviors, and network serialization. Critical for hero registration and ability configuration.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.player
member.summary: Reference to the Player object that controls this hero. Core reference for input handling, player-specific settings, and multiplayer identification. Essential for connecting character actions to player input.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.spawnPositionHasBeenSet
member.summary: Flag indicating the unit's spawn position has been properly initialized. Set to true after spawn setup completes. Prevents duplicate spawn initialization and ensures spawn-related effects only trigger once.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.usePrimaryAvatar
member.summary: Determines whether to display the primary or secondary avatar image in the HUD. Default true shows primary avatar. Passed to all avatar state methods to control which character portrait is displayed. Can be toggled for alternate character representations.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.BurstChest
member.summary: Executes alien chest bursting sequence. Disconnects face hugger, spawns alien xenomorph (only for local player or local insemination), targets nearest player, triggers alien growth, gibs character, and plays sound effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CalculateInseminationFrame
member.summary: Calculates the sprite frame for insemination animation based on infection progression. Returns frames 0-7 based on inseminated counter timing.
member.returns: Animation frame index for insemination state

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanInseminate(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Checks if character can be inseminated by alien face huggers. Requires no existing inseminator, positive health, and health below 1000.
member.param: X force component (unused in logic)
Y force component (unused in logic)
member.returns: True if character can be inseminated, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DisConnectFaceHugger
member.summary: Removes attached face hugger from character. Handles face hugger positioning, disconnection, and UI cleanup.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HasFaceHugger
member.summary: Checks if character currently has a face hugger attached.
member.returns: True if face hugger is attached, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Inseminate(AlienFaceHugger,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Initiates alien insemination process via RPC for network synchronization. Called by face hugger units to begin infection.
member.param: The alien face hugger performing the insemination
X force component for insemination
Y force component for insemination
member.returns: Always returns true

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.InseminateRPC(AlienFaceHugger,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: RPC method that executes alien insemination process. Sets up face hugger attachment, initializes infection counters, updates UI, and plays muffled scream sounds.
member.param: The alien face hugger performing insemination
X force component for insemination
Y force component for insemination

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsInseminated
member.summary: Checks if character is currently in inseminated state with active alien infection.
member.returns: True if inseminated with alien parasite, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RecoverFromInseminatioRPC
member.summary: RPC method that executes insemination recovery. Removes face hugger, resets infection counters, grants invulnerability, and cleans up UI elements.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RecoverFromInsemination
member.summary: Initiates recovery from alien insemination via RPC for network synchronization. Called to cure infection before chest bursting occurs.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.alienBursterPrefab
member.summary: Unit prefab spawned when alien burst occurs from inseminated character.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.inseminatedByLocalUnit
member.summary: Tracks whether alien insemination occurred from local player's unit. Used for network synchronization to ensure consistent alien spawn behavior across clients. Determines whether local machine spawns the alien burster in BurstChest method.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.inseminatedCounter
member.summary: Timer tracking the gestation period after successful alien insemination. Incremented each frame until reaching the burst threshold (typically 5-10 seconds), at which point an alien burster emerges from the unit's chest, killing the host.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.inseminationCounter
member.summary: Timer tracking the insemination process while a face hugger is attached. Incremented while inseminatorUnit is attached, representing the infection progress. When it reaches the threshold, the unit becomes fully inseminated and the gestation phase begins.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.inseminationFrame
member.summary: Animation frame counter for alien face hugger attachment. Tracks animation progression during insemination sequence.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.inseminatorUnit
member.summary: Reference to the AlienFaceHugger currently attached to this unit's face. Set when a face hugger successfully attaches, cleared when the face hugger is destroyed or detaches. When set, prevents normal actions and begins the insemination process.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.reviveSource
member.summary: Reference to the hero that revived this character as a zombie. When set, enables the reviving player to control this zombie through input copying. Checked for zombie AI control decisions and cleared when zombie is destroyed.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.reviveZombieCounter
member.summary: Periodic counter for zombie behavior updates. Triggers zombie-specific actions at 0.4 second intervals. Creates consistent zombie movement patterns and prevents continuous action spam.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.reviveZombieTime
member.summary: Countdown timer before a revived zombie becomes active. Default 2 seconds, randomized on revival between 1.5-2.5 seconds. Prevents instant zombie activation after revival, creating a rising animation period.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.zombieDelay
member.summary: Input delay for zombie movement control. Decremented during zombie input copying from controlling player. Creates intentional lag in zombie response to player commands for gameplay balance.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.zombieOffset
member.summary: Random offset (0-1) that creates behavioral variation between zombies. Used to desynchronize zombie movement and actions by offsetting timing calculations. Ensures multiple zombies don't move in perfect lockstep, creating more organic zombie hordes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.zombieTimerOffset
member.summary: Integer offset for zombie action timing variations. Combined with zombieOffset to create unique behavior patterns for each zombie. Prevents synchronized zombie attacks and movements, making zombie groups feel more chaotic and unpredictable.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualDeath
member.summary: Displays standard ground death animation frame and deactivates gun sprite. Used for normal death situations when character dies on solid ground.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateClimbingLadder
member.summary: Manages comprehensive ladder climbing animation with multiple movement states. Handles transition animations, idle climbing with gun positioning, movement-based climbing with footstep sounds, and specialized climbing animations for up/down movement. Includes proximity detection for ladder presence and appropriate animation fallbacks.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateClimbingLadderTransition(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Handles smooth transition animation between ladder climbing and normal movement states. Manages transition frame progression, frame rates, and sprite positioning during the 6-frame transition sequence.
member.param: True when transitioning into climbing mode, false when transitioning out of climbing mode

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateDancingFrames
member.summary: Displays dancing animation sequence using configurable frame cycling. Deactivates gun and cycles through dancing frames from the specified sprite sheet position with consistent frame rate.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateDeath
member.summary: Death animation dispatcher that selects appropriate death animation based on character state. Prioritizes insemination frames if infected, falling death animation if airborne and not impaled, or standard ground death animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateFallen
member.summary: Virtual method for fallen state animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes to provide custom fallen animation behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateFallingDeath
member.summary: Displays falling death animation frame for characters dying while airborne. Provides different visual feedback compared to ground death.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateGesture
member.summary: Handles comprehensive gesture animation sequences including salute, wave, point, flex, thrust, knee drop, and shush gestures. Manages frame progression, timing, special effects (flex sounds and face hugger disconnection), and looping behavior for different gesture types.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateInseminationFrames
member.summary: Displays alien insemination animation frames based on infection progression. Uses calculated insemination frame index to show appropriate sprite frame from the insemination animation sheet.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateWallAnticipation
member.summary: Manages wall climb anticipation animation with precise knife positioning based on vertical movement. Calculates knife stab positioning relative to previous climb heights and alternates between left and right knife hands for realistic climbing animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateWallClimb
member.summary: Executes active wall climbing animation with realistic knife stab mechanics and height tracking. Manages velocity changes at specific animation frames, alternating knife hands, sound effects, and precise tracking of climbing progress relative to previous stab positions. Includes collision detection for wall interaction events.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateWallDrag
member.summary: Handles wall sliding animation with knife-based climbing mechanics. Manages alternating knife hand positions, velocity-based frame selection, sound effects, and visual particle effects. Supports both new knife climbing frames and legacy animation systems.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ApplyWallClimbingGravity
member.summary: Applies specialized gravity calculations during wall climbing and dragging states. Provides reduced gravity during active climbing phases and maintains upward velocity during certain animation frames to create realistic wall climbing physics.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ChangeFrame
member.summary: Core animation frame dispatcher that routes to appropriate animation methods based on character state and action. Handles priority-based animation selection including frozen state, special unit states (on back, strung up, impaled), and action state-specific animations (idle, running, jumping, climbing, death). Also manages gun activation, sprite offsets, and frame counters for various animation systems.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckAirDash
member.summary: Evaluates conditions for air dash availability and triggers dash if conditions are met. Checks for horizontal air dash availability, ground proximity for dash continuation, and downward air dash when moving straight down.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CoverInAcid
member.summary: Covers TestVanDammeAnim in acid if not invulnerable and eligible. Sends RPC to all clients to apply acid coverage.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CoverInAcidRPC
member.summary: Network RPC method for acid coverage effects. Applies acid visual effects, excluding Alien units entirely. Called remotely to synchronize acid state across network players.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ForceChangeFrame
member.summary: Forces an immediate frame change by calling the ChangeFrame method. Provides public access to trigger frame updates outside of the normal animation cycle.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HasBeenCoveredInAcid
member.summary: Checks if TestVanDammeAnim is currently covered in acid.
member.returns: True if covered in acid, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IncreaseFrame
member.summary: Advances the main animation frame counter and insemination frame counter if face hugger is attached. This method synchronizes both animation systems to ensure proper frame progression during alien infection states.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsGesturing
member.summary: Checks if character is currently performing any gesture animation by verifying the current gesture state is not None.
member.returns: True if character is performing a gesture, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayFootStepSound
member.summary: Plays surface-appropriate footstep sounds with default volume and pitch settings (0.4 volume, 1.0 pitch).

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayFootStepSound(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Plays surface-specific footstep sounds based on current environment and character state. Automatically selects appropriate sound arrays for quicksand, ladder climbing, or ground surface types (Dirt, Stone, Metal, Wood, Grass, Slime). Also triggers long grass sound effects when applicable.
member.param: Volume level for the footstep sound
Pitch level for the footstep sound

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayLongGrassSound(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Plays environment-specific footstep sounds for grass and blood surfaces with timing control. Checks for jiggle doodads on the current block to determine sound type, playing blood sounds at reduced volume for blood doodads or grass sounds for other doodads.
member.param: Whether to respect the grass delay timer to prevent audio spam. If false, plays sound immediately regardless of timer
member.returns: True if a sound was played, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RemoveAcid
member.summary: Removes acid coverage from TestVanDammeAnim by sending RPC to all clients if conditions are met.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RemoveAcidRPC
member.summary: RPC method that removes acid coverage. Restores default material, enables gun sprite, and creates slime particle effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunCoveredInAcid
member.summary: Handles ongoing acid coverage effects including cage busting damage, checkpoint recovery, melting animations, and acid particle generation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunStepOnWalls
member.summary: Triggers step-on events for wall surfaces during climbing or dragging. Performs raycasting to detect wall colliders and sends step messages for interaction with climbable surfaces.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetGestureAnimation(GestureElement.Gestures)
member.summary: Sets and manages gesture animation state with frame reset and multiplayer achievement tracking. Blocks movement during gesture animation and awards achievement when all 4 players perform gestures simultaneously.
member.param: The gesture type to animate (None, Salute, Wave, Point, Flex, Thrust, KneeDrop, Shhh)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StartDashing
member.summary: Initiates dashing movement with speed multipliers and visual effects. Manages dash availability based on air state, applies speed modifiers with diminishing returns for successive dashes, and creates appropriate dash effects. Handles both ground and air dash scenarios.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TriggerFlexEvent
member.summary: Triggers perk system flex event for muscle flexing gestures. Activates associated perks and bonuses when character performs flex animation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.acidMeltTimer
member.summary: Controls the melting process timing. Initialized to 1 second when acid is applied and can be extended by 0.3 seconds with additional acid damage. When it reaches 0, triggers the Melt method.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.acidParticleTimer
member.summary: Controls timing of acid particle effect spawning. Decrements each frame while covered in acid and resets to 0.1 seconds, triggering green slime particle creation at regular intervals.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hasBeenCoverInAcid
member.summary: Tracks whether unit is currently covered in acid. Blocks certain actions while true and triggers acid particle effects and melting process. Reset when recovering from acid effects.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hasMelted
member.summary: Indicates if unit has completed the melting process from acid damage. One-way flag that is never reset once set. Prevents particle spawning after melting is complete.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastRecoveredFromAcidTime
member.summary: Timestamp tracking when unit last recovered from acid effects. Enforces minimum 1.5 second delay between recoveries for player-controlled units only.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckHighFive
member.summary: Checks conditions for high-five interactions with nearby players. Validates proximity and state requirements, triggering high-five boost when conditions are met.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CreateHighFiveEffects
member.summary: Creates visual and audio effects for successful high-five interactions including particles and screen effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HighFiveBoost(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Applies high-five boost effects including speed enhancement and visual effects.
member.param: Whether this character initiated the high-five

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReleaseHighFive
member.summary: Handles releasing the high-five gesture. Updates animation frame, sets appropriate state flags, triggers frame change, and dismisses the high-five bubble if present.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StartHighFive
member.summary: Initializes the high-five gesture action. Resets related timers and flags, sets holding high-five state to true, resets the animation frame, and triggers a frame update.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TryConnectHighFive
member.summary: Attempts to connect with nearby character for high-five interaction. Returns success status for networking.
member.returns: True if high-five connection successful, false otherwise

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.high5Bubble
member.summary: Special reaction bubble specifically for high-five interactions. Displays prompts when players are close enough to perform a high-five. Shows button prompts and timing windows for successful high-five execution between players.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.highFive
member.summary: Current frame's high-five input state from player controls. When pressed, triggers high-five gesture attempts with nearby players.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.highFiveBoost
member.summary: Indicates if the high-five speed boost is currently active. When true, character movement speed is increased by the highFiveBoostM multiplier.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.highFiveBoostM
member.summary: Movement speed multiplier during high-five boost state. Applied by multiplying delta time calculations when boost is active, effectively increasing animation and movement speed.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.highFiveBoostTime
member.summary: Remaining duration of the high-five boost effect in seconds. Counts down each frame while the boost is active.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.highFiveNoBoost
member.summary: Temporary state that prevents high-five boosts from being applied. Used to prevent boost stacking or rapid re-triggering of boosts.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.highFiveNoBoostTime
member.summary: Duration of high-five boost prevention in seconds. Typically set to 0.2 seconds after certain actions. When this timer expires, highFiveNoBoost is automatically cleared.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.highfiveHoldTime
member.summary: Tracks the duration the high-five gesture has been held. Increments during the high-five animation and resets to -1.5 after 0.5 seconds to create a cooldown period between high-fives.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.holdingHighFive
member.summary: Indicates that the character is currently initiating a high-five gesture. Set to true when starting a high-five. Cleared when the high-five is released through ReleaseHighFive() either manually or when connecting with another player.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ignoreHighFivePressTime
member.summary: Cooldown timer that prevents rapid high-five or special ability triggering. Set to 0.1 seconds after certain actions and prevents new high-five attempts while greater than zero.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.player1Bubble
member.summary: Reaction bubble UI element for player 1. Displays context-sensitive prompts like "PRESS X TO HIGH FIVE" or AFK indicators. Positioned above the character and shown/hidden based on game state and player proximity.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.player2Bubble
member.summary: Reaction bubble UI element for player 2. Functions identically to player1Bubble but for the second player. Enables multiplayer interaction prompts and status indicators specific to player 2's perspective.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.player3Bubble
member.summary: Reaction bubble UI element for player 3. Displays context-sensitive prompts and status indicators above the third player's character in 4-player local multiplayer. Functions identically to player1Bubble and player2Bubble but for the third player slot.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.player4Bubble
member.summary: Reaction bubble UI element for player 4. Displays context-sensitive prompts and status indicators above the fourth player's character in 4-player local multiplayer. Completes the set of player bubbles for full 4-player support.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.releasingHighFive
member.summary: Tracks when the high-five input has been released. Set when the player releases the high-five button and used to control the end of the high-five animation state.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.showHighFiveAfterMeleeTimer
member.summary: Timer that delays high-five prompt display after melee attacks. Incremented after successful melee, triggers prompt at 1.5 seconds. Reset when melee is activated. Encourages cooperative play by prompting celebratory interactions after combat.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.successfulHighFive
member.summary: Indicates that a high-five has successfully connected with another player. When true and animation reaches frame 4, triggers high-five boost effects. Automatically cleared after the animation completes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.successfulHighFiveActiveBro
member.summary: Identifies whether this character was the initiator of a successful high-five. Used to determine which player receives the high-five boost effect.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasHighFive
member.summary: Previous frame's high-five input state. Used for edge detection to determine when the high-five button is first pressed rather than held.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckForKick
member.summary: Checks proximity to other players and handles kick interactions. Shows kick bubble when eligible, changes bubble material based on proximity, and executes kicks when conditions are met.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Kick
member.summary: Initiates player kick process by sending RPC to all clients if character hasn't been kicked yet.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.KickRPC
member.summary: RPC method that executes the kick sequence. Shows kick bubble, starts kick routine, and marks character as kicked.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.KickRoutine
member.summary: Coroutine that handles the visual kick countdown sequence. Flashes kick bubble materials with decreasing intervals, then gibs character and creates explosion effects.
member.returns: IEnumerator for coroutine execution

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ShowKickBubble
member.summary: Creates kick player bubble UI if it doesn't exist, positions it above character, parents it to transform, and refreshes Y start position. If bubble already exists but is hidden, restarts the bubble animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopKickBubble
member.summary: Stops the kick player bubble animation if it exists.
